quizzes.subject: algebra
quizzes.title: Algebra Fundamentals Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of basic algebraic concepts

questions.question: Solve for x: 2x + 5 = 13
questions.explanation: Subtract 5 from both sides: 2x = 8, then divide by 2: x = 4

questions.question: What is the value of x in the equation: 3x - 7 = 14
questions.explanation: Add 7 to both sides: 3x = 21, then divide by 3: x = 7

questions.question: Simplify the expression: 2(x + 3) + 4
questions.explanation: Distribute 2: 2x + 6, then add 4: 2x + 10

questions.question: Solve the inequality: 3x + 2 > 11
questions.explanation: Subtract 2: 3x > 9, then divide by 3: x > 3

questions.question: What is the slope of the line y = 2x + 3?
questions.explanation: In the form y = mx + b, m is the slope, so the slope is 2

quizzes.subject: geometry
quizzes.title: Geometry Basics Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of basic geometric concepts

questions.question: What is the area of a rectangle with length 8 and width 6?
questions.explanation: Area = length × width = 8 × 6 = 48

questions.question: What is the perimeter of a square with side length 5?
questions.explanation: Perimeter = 4 × side length = 4 × 5 = 20

questions.question: What is the area of a circle with radius 3? (Use π = 3.14)
What is the volume of a cube with side length 4?
questions.explanation: Volume = side length³ = 4³ = 64

quizzes.subject: grammar
quizzes.title: Grammar Fundamentals Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of basic grammar rules

questions.question: Which sentence is grammatically correct?
questions.explanation: The plural subject 'they' requires the plural verb 'are'

questions.question: Choose the correct form: 'She _____ to the store yesterday.'
questions.explanation: Past tense of 'go' is 'went'

questions.question: Which word is a conjunction?
questions.explanation: 'And' is a conjunction that connects words or phrases

questions.question: Identify the subject in: 'The cat sleeps peacefully.'
questions.explanation: 'The cat' is the complete subject of the sentence

quizzes.subject: early-civilization
quizzes.title: Ancient Civilizations Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of early human civilizations

questions.question: Which ancient civilization built the pyramids?
questions.explanation: The ancient Egyptians built the famous pyramids as tombs for their pharaohs

questions.question: What was the first major civilization in Mesopotamia?
questions.explanation: The Sumerians were the first major civilization in Mesopotamia, known for inventing writing

questions.question: Which river was central to ancient Egyptian civilization?
questions.explanation: The Nile River was essential to Egyptian agriculture and civilization

questions.question: What was the Code of Hammurabi?
questions.explanation: The Code of Hammurabi was one of the first written legal codes in history

quizzes.subject: cell-biology
quizzes.title: Cell Biology Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of cell structure and function

questions.question: What is the control center of the cell?
questions.explanation: The nucleus contains the cell's genetic material and controls cell activities

questions.question: Which organelle produces energy for the cell?
questions.explanation: Mitochondria are known as the powerhouse of the cell, producing ATP

questions.question: What is the function of the cell membrane?
options: To control what enters and exits the cell
questions.correctAnswer: To control what enters and exits the cell
questions.explanation: The cell membrane is selectively permeable, controlling substance movement

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT found in plant cells?
questions.explanation: Centrioles are found in animal cells but not typically in plant cells

quizzes.subject: programming
quizzes.title: Programming Basics Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of fundamental programming concepts

questions.question: What is a variable in programming?
questions.explanation: A variable is a named container that stores data values

questions.question: What is the purpose of a loop in programming?
questions.explanation: Loops allow you to execute the same code multiple times

questions.question: What is an algorithm?
questions.explanation: An algorithm is a finite sequence of well-defined instructions

questions.question: What does 'debugging' mean in programming?
questions.explanation: Debugging is the process of identifying and removing errors from code
